newsitem.title: FINLAND: LANNEN SEES 96 EARNINGS SOMEWHAT BELOW 95.
newsitem.headline: LANNEN SEES 96 EARNINGS SOMEWHAT BELOW 95.

text.p: Finnish foodstuffs group Lannen Tehtaat Oy said on Tuesday it expected its full-year 1996 earnings before extraordinary items to be somewhat below 1995.
"The group's earnings before extraordinary items will fall somewhat behind 1995 earnings," Lannen Tehtaat said in a statement with its January-August results.
But full-year 1996 earnings per share was expected to match 5.06 markka of 1995 due to lower taxes, the company said.
Lannen Tehtaat said it expected its net sales to exceed 850 million markka in 1996.
Lannen Tehtaat's 1995 profit before extraordinary items and tax was 50.0 million markka, and its net sales were 783.1 million markka.

Lannen Tehtaat said earlier its January-August profit before extraordinary items and taxes fell to 25.8 million markka from 31.5 million, and its earnings per share eased to 3.21 markka from 3.97 markka.
The company's eight-month net sales rose to 565.2 million markka from 491.0 million.
